description:
In this course I will cover all of the ideas and tools I used to successfully sell very high end product's to my affluent clients for over 20 years. This course will help any sales person become a valuable long term asset to their clientele. These simple and powerful tools will greatly increase your sales. I explain concepts and tell personal story's of success to easily convey these powerful concepts. I have given this course to hundreds of people all over the world with tremdous seccuss.

In this course I cover these topics:

How to understand what Luxury is and the Luxury buyer

Why people buy what they buy

How to not limit your sales to what you can afford (how to stop selling from your own pocket book)

How to create excitement and passion with your customers.

This course is full of rich video that will take about 40 minutes to complete. If you sell products to end users this may be the most valuable 40 minutes of your life.
title: Luxury Selling - Selling to the Affluent - Sales training
